metadata.title: CVE-2020-6470 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in clipboard in Google Chromeprior to 83.0.4103.61 allowed a local attacker to inject arbitrary scriptsor HTML (UXSS) via crafted clipboard contents.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
